/usr/bin/c++       CMakeFiles/cppview.dir/cppview.cpp.o  -o ../../bin/cppview -rdynamic ../../lib/libfreenect.so.0.1.2 -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lpthread -lm -L/home/cos/source/cwrr/cwrs/images/ms/lib/libusb-1.0.as -Wl,-rpath,/home/cos/source/cwrr/cwrs/mediastation/dep/libusb/lib:
